text: Getting fired can ’ t stop Brad Pitt from forecasting the weather! The 54 - year - old War Machine actor made his return to Comedy Central ’ s The Jim Jefferies Show as his bleak weatherman persona. What was he morbidly musing about this time? Climate change. “ We ’ ve got sunshine in the west, the south, the east, and over here in the north, the ice caps are melting and I am so so so so scared, ” he said. “ Didn ’ t we fire you? ” host Jim Jefferies asked. They did.
